item.title: Status Update: Feb 26, 2010
item.description: BUSY: Setting up LAN at A Hostel (yay!) BUSY: Exams start on Wednesday March 3; worrying when to start study ;) BUSY: Trying to design a database to be used in CSED’s website BUSY: Thinking when to read the book The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy by Douglas Adams which has been chosen by me for a review BUSY: Thinking what date to reserve train tickets to home after end sems
